title: Daniel Craig: Christoph Waltz has a darkness about him
text:
Christoph Waltz has a ''darkness about him'', according to co-star Daniel Craig. 
Daniel Craig thinks Christoph Waltz has a ''darkness about him''. 
The 47-year-old star - who's reprised the role of the secret agent for the new Sam Mendes -directed movie - has hailed his on-screen co-star and given fans of the franchise an insight to his performance in the new film. 
He shared: ''Christoph is... what an actor! 
''I made this joke that he used to come to set with his two Oscars and slap them down on the table and say 'right let's begin!' 
''He's an amazing actor, he's got this darkness about him and it's such a beautiful nuance performance.'' 
Meanwhile, Daniel also revealed he relished the opportunity to flirt with his sexy on-screen secretary Miss Moneypenny, played by Naomie Harris . 
Speaking to chat-show host Jonathan Ross, the English actor said: ''There is a great working relationship that's a big flirt. It's great to play and Naomie does it brilliantly.'' 
He admitted, too, that he couldn't envision himself being friends with a real-life Bond. 
Daniel observed: ''It's one of those things - he's fun at a party but don't stay too late.'' 
'James Bond's Spectre with Jonathan Ross' is due to air on Saturday October 17 on ITV. Contactmusic
